properties.description: Radio checked status         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: check

properties.description: Radio deactivation         Values can be: true or false         Default: false
properties.name: disabled

properties.description: Space that occupy the radio inside parent container.        By default, its size adapts to its content        Values can be: true or false        Default: true
properties.name: inline

methods.description: Call method to update check status
methods.name: _setCheck
